headline: Selita Ebanks Shows Some Leg On The Red Carpet
short descr: Shop a similar look below and check out more of our Look Of The Day picks. WHERE: At Life & Style's "A Summer Of Style" event
image_caption(s): Laundry by Shelli Segal Blouson Halter Smocked Print Maxi Dress, $138
article: WHO:  Model and swimsuit designer Selita Ebanks WHAT:  If anyone can rock a high slit maxi-dress (other than Angelina Jolie), it would be Ebanks. The former Victoria's Secret Angel embraced summer in a bold patterned dress, neon purple clutch, bright orange nails and metallic gold accessories. Side-swept curls and bronze makeup rounded out her hot-weather look. WHERE:  At Life & Style's "A Summer Of Style" event in NYC on June 20th Jason Kempin/WireImage for Life & Style Shop a similar look below and check out more of our Look Of The Day picks.Want more?
